scripts.build: tar czvf build/tarball-$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M%S').tar.gz -C www fonts images scripts styles index.html
scripts.check: jscs www/scripts && npm run check:android && npm run check:ios
scripts.clean: npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios
scripts.clean:android: cd platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www && rm -rf fonts images scripts styles index.html
scripts.clean:ios: cd platforms/ios/www && rm -rf fonts images scripts styles index.html
scripts.copy: npm run copy:android && npm run copy:ios
